text: Ðis sindon þa landgemæro to sunnanbyrig.
Ærest on sunnan hyg þanon andlang streames on crudan scypsteal þanon ofer ða mæde on eclesbroc &lang broces on ða mearcdic.
&lang dices on hwæte dene norðewearde of hwæte dene on þa oðre mearcdic &lang dices on cottes hyrste westewearde of cottes hyrste on riscmere of riscmere on eadbryhtes hlæw.
Of þam hlæwe on þone ellenstub ðonon on mearcwill of mearcwille on duddes byre on þone clofenan beorh of þam beorhge on sunnan hyg.
And her hyrdð to tynn gyrda of þære mæde to halgan forde & ælce geare into sunnanbyrig of burhwuda fiftig foðra wudes & fiftig swina mæsten.
Þis is þara X hida land boc æt Sunnanbyrig ðe Eadgar cyning gebocode Ælfhege his mæge on ece yrfe.
